elements.name: The deletion of the address record via the API should be confirmed through the API itself.
elements.description:
(The Deleted_Id returned in the response body can be used to send a GET request to the /api/profile/customerDetailsAddress
  endpoint to confirm that the record has been deleted.)

steps.name: The api user constructs the base url with the "customer" token.
The api user sets "api/profile/customerDetailsAddress" path parameters
The api user prepares a GET request containing the Deleted 170 to send to the api profile customerDetailsAddress endpoint.
The api user records the response from the api profile customerDetailsAddress endpoint and confirms that the status code is '404' and the reason phrase is Not Found.

name: As a user, I want to be able to delete the information of the address in my profile with the specified
description: ID number through the API connection.
